studyArms.name: Treatment Arm A (Placebo + BR)
studyArms.description: Placebo capsules administered orally once daily continuously in combination with bendamustine and rituximab (BR) for 6 cycles, followed by rituximab maintenance for responders.

studyArms.name: Treatment Arm B (Ibrutinib + BR)
studyArms.description: Ibrutinib 560 mg administered orally once daily continuously in combination with bendamustine and rituximab (BR) for 6 cycles, followed by rituximab maintenance for responders.

studyDesign.name: Study Design
stratificationFactors: Simplified Mantle Cell Lymphoma International Prognostic Index (MIPI) score
Simplified Mantle Cell Lymphoma International Prognostic Index (MIPI) score

arms.name: Treatment Arm A (Placebo + BR)
arms.description: Placebo capsules administered orally once daily continuously in combination with bendamustine and rituximab (BR) for 6 cycles, followed by rituximab maintenance for responders.

arms.name: Treatment Arm B (Ibrutinib + BR)
arms.description: Ibrutinib 560 mg administered orally once daily continuously in combination with bendamustine and rituximab (BR) for 6 cycles, followed by rituximab maintenance for responders.

epochs.name: Screening
epochs.description: Up to 30 days prior to randomization

epochs.name: BR Treatment Period (Cycles 1 to 6)
epochs.description: Bendamustine (Days 1, 2) and Rituximab (Day 1) every 28 days for up to 6 cycles plus daily study drug/placebo

epochs.name: R Maintenance Period (Cycles 8 to 30)
epochs.description: For subjects with CR or PR: Rituximab every second cycle (every 8 weeks) for up to 12 additional doses plus daily study drug/placebo

epochs.name: Post-Cycle 30 / Continuous Treatment
epochs.description: Continuous daily study drug/placebo until disease progression or unacceptable toxicity

epochs.name: End of Treatment Visit
epochs.description: Within 30 days after the last dose of the last study treatment

epochs.name: Posttreatment Follow-up Phase
epochs.description: Follow-up until progressive disease and subsequent survival follow-up
